mapper.delete: DELETE FROM evaluation_expert.exam_item WHERE section_id IN ( SELECT s.id FROM evaluation_expert.exam_section s WHERE s.exam_id = #{examId} )
mapper.select: SELECT esi.id AS examScoreItemId, q.stem AS question, esi.answer AS solution, ei.score AS score, qsa.answer AS answer, qsa.criteria AS criteria FROM evaluation_expert.exam_score_item esi INNER JOIN evaluation_expert.exam_item ei ON ei.id = esi.exam_item_id INNER JOIN evaluation_expert.question q ON q.id = ei.question_id LEFT JOIN evaluation_expert.question_short_answer qsa ON qsa.question_id = q.id WHERE esi.score_id = #{scoreId} AND esi.exam_item_id = #{examItemId}
